comment.author: 17643926@N00
comment._content: Unlike the woman on the right (and the men, for that matter), this beggar woman isn't wearing a hat. She was probably an immigrant and immigrant women covered their heads with shawls. This woman's shawl has fallen down over her shoulders from the weight of the baby. As the grim looks on the pedestrians faces show, she was a disruptive presence on the street.
